header.title: Technology saving lives
header.content: An accelerator program to boost solutions against the COVID-19 crisis.

box1.title: Program
box1.content: A minimum of 4 solutions are supported with â‚¬20,000 of equity-free capital each, mentorship and reach.

box2.title: Support System
box2.content: Through the contributing partners we're offering a wide range of support services from tech to marketing and institutional access to all participants.

box3.title: Open Ecosystem
box3.content: We are investing into building an active Ecosystem by providing a database of all relevant COVID-19 initiatives, and other outreach activities.

ctaBox.claim: You want to be part of the accelerator?

header.title: An open initiative led by the digital economy

box1.title: Agile Development
box1.content: As strong tech partners, we invest together in building the apps and tools our country needs right now, user-friendly, open source, fast.

box2.title: Digital Support
box2.content: We support other digital initiatives with our resources to effectively improve the data situation. Contact us with ideas and needs.

box3.title: Open Ecosystem
box3.content: We are looking forward to exchange with all other digital initiatives, to join forces and promote cooperation with regular updates.

partners.claim: Want to help make a difference?

initiatives.content:
In order to contain COVID-19, a worldwide competition of ideas is emerging, significantly accelerated by the tech industry and others. We are not only bringing together the resources and capabilities of the German digital economy. We also seek and promote open exchange with other digital initiatives so that the ideas with the greatest potential can prevail. 

 Here you will find exciting digital initiatives and technologies from around the world - continuously updated. If you would like to add more projects to this showcase, please contact us.
